badges.name: Expendable
badges.description: Join the game for the first time.

badges.name: You've Got Great Taste!
badges.description: You're just so dashing. Buy a new uniform.

badges.name: Send In The Next Team
badges.description: We've got plenty in reserve. Die for the first time.

badges.name: Leave The Dead Where They Fall
badges.description: They're only dead weight. Die 10 times.

badges.name: Dropping Like Flies
badges.description: Die 25 times.

badges.name: Drowning In An Ocean Of Corpses
badges.description: Most of which are your own. Die 50 times.

badges.name: The Floors Are Their Canvas
badges.description: Your Blood Is Their Paint. Die 100 times.

badges.name: No Refunds~
badges.description: Thanks for the money, idiot! Revive for the first time.

badges.name: Every Lung Has Its Iron
badges.description: Survive an encounter with The Angler.

badges.name: Ready For Anything
badges.description: Survive an encounter with Pinkie.

badges.name: An Ocean Of Blood
badges.description: Swimming in the sea of dying stars. Survive an encounter with Froger.

badges.name: Oh
badges.description: Survive an encounter with Blitz.

badges.name: Good Things Come To Those Who Wait
badges.description: Survive an encounter with the one who trails smoke.

badges.name: WAR
badges.description: Survive an encounter with Pandemonium.

badges.name: D-Rank
badges.description: ESC + Restart. Survive an encounter with Pandemonium without being spotted.

badges.name: Can't Take My Eyes Off You
badges.description: Survive an encounter with Eyefestation.

badges.name: +ENRAGED
badges.description: Enrage Eyefestation and survive the encounter. Hope you enjoy the rest of your run.

badges.name: Loser
badges.description: Ha ha. Meet the Good People.

badges.name: Fool Me Once, Twice, Thrice, Fource And Fivce
badges.description: Ha ha*5. Open 5 seperate fake doors in 1 run.

badges.name: huh wuh
badges.description: A dark embrace. Get taken by the Void.

badges.name: Will 2 Live
badges.description: Help a teammate out of the Void.

badges.name: Smartest ROBLOX Players
badges.description: Die in the same locker as someone else.

badges.name: A Shot In The Dark
badges.description: Get attacked by a Squiddle.

badges.name: Too Close To The Sun
badges.description: Aggro a Squiddle above 90%, then look away.

badges.name: They're In The Walls
badges.description: Your footsteps are not your own. Scare off a Wall Dweller.

badges.name: Not On MY Watch!
badges.description: Scare off a Wall Dweller who is currently following a teammate OR beat a Wall Dweller to death who is currently attacking a teammate.

badges.name: We Outta Wall Dwellers
badges.description: Yummers. Eat the flesh of a fallen Wall Dweller.

badges.name: Ouch Ouchie STOOOOPPPP!!!!
badges.description: Following basic instructions must be sooooo haaaard. Shake off a parasitic infestation.

badges.name: Eyes In The Skies
badges.description: Survive the Searchlights Grand Encounter.

badges.name: Search Party
badges.description: Beat the Searchlights Ending encounter.

badges.name: Uneasy Alliance
badges.description: The only reason you're playing this game. Meet The Saboteur in “person”.

badges.name: Just Good Business
badges.description: Buy The Saboteur's entire stock.

badges.name: POP! Goes The Weasel
badges.description: Have HQ detonate your PDG.

badges.name: Letting Go Of POVERTY, Watch This!
badges.description: Have Z-779's broadcast trigger your PDG.

badges.name: Mysterious Benefactor
badges.description: Meet Mr. Lopee.
Get a Medkit from a teammate and use it/Give a medkit to a teammate and have them use it.

badges.name: Walking Database
badges.description: Hold $3000 worth of data at once.

badges.name: This MIGHT Be Bunny?
badges.description: Find a rare item. Hi zerum!

badges.name: Death Any%
badges.description: Die before the game has even begun.

badges.name: *splat*
badges.description: Get crushed by a Trenchbleeder.

badges.name: Hi Again
badges.description: Survive an encounter with The Multi Monster.

badges.name: Artifice
badges.description: Drink a Party Special OR open a special chest.

badges.name: Pardoned
badges.description: Escape the Hadal Blacksite and earn your freedom.

badges.name: Extra Careful
badges.description: Escape the Hadal Blacksite without taking any damage. Dying counts as damage.

badges.name: Lonely
badges.description: Starting as a team of 4 or more, escape the Blacksite as the last one standing.

badges.name: Power Of Friendship
badges.description: Escape the Hadal Blacksite with a team of 2 or more players, with noone dying and everyone making it to the end.

badges.name: Group Of Sweats
badges.description: Escape the Hadal Blacksite with a team of 4 or more players, with noone dying and everyone making it to the end.

badges.name: This Badge Sucks
badges.description: Escape the Hadal Blacksite with a team of 8 or more players, with noone dying and everyone making it to the end.

badges.name: We Die In The Dark
badges.description: Reach the end of The Ridge on a solo run, having never picked up a light source. Revives not allowed.

badges.name: Im Outta Here!
badges.description: Escape the Hadal Blacksite in under 45 minutes.

badges.name: We Didn't Playtest To Make Sure This Was Possible
badges.description: Reach the end of The Ridge on a solo run, having never hidden in a locker. Revives not allowed.

badges.name: Ahh, Those Were The Bad Turrets, Weren't They?
badges.description: Survive an encounter with a turret without getting shredded.

badges.name: LOOK AT ME
badges.description: Survive a Gauntlet.

badges.name: You Deserve This
badges.description: Get murked by Sebastian.

badges.name: AI Slop
badges.description: Meet the Painter face to face.

badges.name: Lonely No Longer
badges.description: Summon a new not-so imaginary friend.

badges.name: SEBASTIAN GOT YOU
badges.description: maybe next time don't pester him so much!

badges.name: Dress Code Violation
badges.description: Make your way to the heart of The Raveyard.

badges.name: Candle Wax
badges.description: Escape from the flooded crypt.

badges.name: Where's Everyone Going? BINGO?
badges.description: Return to the surface.

badges.name: So I Guess We'll Never Dance Again
badges.description: What a party poober!

badges.name: Put It On My Tab
badges.description: At Club Spectrum, order 10 health tonics in one run.

badges.name: Monster Mash
badges.description: At Club Spectrum, dance with some friendly skeletons. On PC, ask for H elp. On Console, move harder. On mobile, aim for the money.

badges.name: Zero
badges.description: Turn the tides and kill a Hanger.

badges.name: wawa
badges.description: Trade an item with a Deep Sea Bunny.

badges.name: wops
badges.description: Kill a Deep Sea Bunny.

badges.name: Glutton For Punishment
badges.description: On a solo run, outrage (Purple) Eyefestation before door 25, then make your way to the end of The Ridge.

badges.name: Treasure Map To Infinite Bloxy Cola
badges.description: Escape a room containing a Candlebrute.

badges.name: DiVine Intervention
badges.description: Survive a DiVine beatdown.

badges.name: Death Incarnate
badges.description: Meet Harbinger.

badges.name: Where's My Win?
badges.description: In Endless, reach room number 100.

badges.name: Victory Lap?
badges.description: In Endless, reach room number 250.

badges.name: Premium Payout Or "Difficult" Badge, Call It
badges.description: In Endless, reach room number 500.

badges.name: Diminishing Returns
badges.description: In Endless, hold $10000 worth of data at once.

badges.name: BadgeTest.png
badges.description: In Endless, take 300 damage in a run without dying.

badges.name: Friends Forever (the next 47 hours)
badges.description: Escape the Hadal Blacksite with an Imaginary Friend!

badges.name: Who Cares About OSHA?
badges.description: Disarm a Tripwire.

badges.name: Parale Parali
badges.description: Escape from the Dredge roomtype.
